main event: Several objects were observed flying at a high altitude in Hampton, Virginia.
interesting points: Witness observed 10 to 15 unidentified objects simultaneously,The objects appeared to be at an altitude of 70 miles,The observation lasted approximately 4 to 5 minutes,The witness was an amateur astronomer with experience in observing jets and astronomical phenomena,The objects' speed was noted to be much faster than any known jet at the time.
witness description: an amateur astronomer and aeronautical research scientist
